channel.title: 3 questions, your veiws please :)
channel.description:
Hi, 2 questions, one is your help, the other your opinion.
1. How do i change it so it keeps the max lvl at 99 but changes max combat to 126?
2. How do i get a shop to work, i just got a greegree guide of rune-server and it didn't work.
3. Here it is people, start posting where u think is the best start place is
Thanks in advance, please, if you know the answer to number 1, tell me and number 3 is a free vote!
